title: Happy Birthday, Yoshiko-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>I’ve come to pick you up. Fallen Angel - Yohane-sama<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eh? What?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Geez~, you’re supposed to say “You’re late, little demon”!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eh, aah, you’re late, little demon! ….but, seriously, what?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Tonight, we shall hold a festival to commemorate Yohane-sama’s birthday…. We, your little demons, have prepared some entertainment for you. So, let us depart!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eeh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Fufu, happy birthday, Yoshiko-chan!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>What the hell, what…. What is this all of a sudden…. *Sniff*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ah, eh, d-, don’t cry~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I’m not…. *Sniff*, crying!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>That’s right, the star of today’s show is the Fallen Angel - Yohane-sama after all, so you have to keep a smile that’s becoming of her. Alright then, let’s go! Everyone is waiting!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>*Sniff*.... Don’t say anything about this to anyone, okay….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Of course! So make sure you have the best smile on your face by the time we get there, okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
